make CTRs store only the CID in the Lab.task_reflection: The task involves modifying how constructor terms (CTRs) store their metadata. Currently, the `Lab` field of a CTR term stores both the constructor ID (CID) and the arity, encoded together using the `u12v2` encoding scheme. The task requires moving the arity out of the `Lab` field and into a global static object in C, so that the `Lab` field only stores the CID. This change will require updates to the code that interacts with CTR terms, particularly where the arity is extracted or used.
